diva.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a very successful and famous female singer
diva.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a famous or important woman who behaves badly or gets angry when people do not give her the attention or treatment she thinks she deserves
diva.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: She's such a diva - she walked out of the interview because she thought the interviewer was rude.
